text: Tegan and Sara () is a Canadian indie rock duo, made up of twin sisters Tegan and Sara Quin. They are lesbians. They have released ten albums. ==Career== At first they called themselves PLUNK. They released their first album, Under Feet Like Ours, in 1999 as Sara and Tegan. In 2000 they released The Business of Art, their second album. They were nominated for four prizes at the 2014 Juno Awards. They are feminists. == References == Category:1995 establishments in Canada Category:1990s Canadian music groups Category:2000s Canadian music groups Category:2010s Canadian music groups Category:Calgary Category:Canadian feminists Category:Canadian LGBT people Category:Canadian rock bands Category:Indie bands Category:Lesbian feminists Category:LGBT musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1995 Category:New wave bands Category:Twin people from Canada
title: Tegan and Sara
